name: Hieratic Chant (Skill Card)
text:
[ SKILL ACTIVATION ]
At the start of the Duel, flip this card over.

[ SKILL EFFECT ]
Activate this Skill during your Main Phase.
Discard your entire hand (min. 1), add 1 "The Winged Dragon of Ra" from your Deck or GY to your hand, and if you do, you can Tribute Summon 1 monster during your Main Phase this turn, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set.
